title: Matías Sosa (footballer, born 1992)
text:
Nello Matías Sosa (born February 26, 1992 in <a href="Neuqu%C3%A9n%2C%20Argentina">Neuquén</a>) is an <a href="Argentina">Argentine</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="Club%20Cipolletti">Cipolletti</a>.
International career.
In 2009 Sosa played with the <a href="Argentina%20national%20under-17%20football%20team">Argentina Under-17</a> at the <a href="2009%20FIFA%20U-17%20World%20Cup">2009 FIFA World Cup</a> in <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>.
